entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10 except minus 16 inland.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10 except minus 16 inland. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 02 March 2023
